name: DSGVO snippet for Leaflet Map and its Extensions
author: hupe13

sections.description:
GDPR

According to the GDPR, the user must actively agree if content is to be loaded from third-party servers.
The WordPress plugins Leaflet Map and Extensions for Leaflet Map are loading content from the defined tile servers as well as unpkg.com.
This plugin requests the user’s permission to load the maps.
You can customize the text and use it on your own responsibility.

The plugin supports Theme and plugin translation for Polylang (TTfP).
sections.installation:
• Install and configure the plugin Leaflet Map.
  • Install and configure the plugin Extensions for Leaflet Map.
  • Then install this plugin.
  • Go to Settings – Leaflet Map – Leaflet Map GDPR and get documentation and settings options.
sections.faq:
Is that enough to comply with the GDPR?

  • I don’t know, ask a law expert.

short_description: Respect the DSGVO / GDPR when you use Leaflet Map and Extensions for Leaflet Map.
